entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
